lines.text: If you want to know why he’d do something like that… I think you just need to look outside.
Only your police perimeter! Y’know, the one you established around the building when the crime was reported!
Like… well, if he didn’t fake his-
<f=TitleOption>Uh, I mean, if he didn’t get frozen by <c=#0000FF>Flesh to Stone...</c></f>
...you’d have just arrested him on the spot!
That gunshot earlier was loud enough to get your attention- and he’d have known you were on your way.
Good thing he’s totally dead, or he’d be in handcuffs right now.
Once we wrap this up, we can all go home, and leave that statue sitting in this abandoned apartment.
It’ll be totally unguarded, but who cares, right?
<f=TitleOption>Everyone in this room is dead as a doornail!</f>
Yep. There’s no reason to keep up a perimeter...
<f=TitleOption>...since we don’t have any livin’ suspects.</f>
